question.title: The new GUI Builder doesn't show on the screen
question.body: I started with Codename One. I set up the development environment (Eclipse) and followed the instructions as shown on the homepage. When I create a new GUI Builder class, the file is shown, but when I a double-click on it, it doesn't show up on the screen. When I right-click on it, and choose open with GUI Builder, it doesn't show up either. I can't start the (new) GUI Builder in any form.
